alert.note: Alert for Eaton; Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 10:24AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Ingham and eastern Eaton Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1024 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near East Lansing to 5 miles east of Potterville. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Mason... Eaton Rapids... East Lansing... Williamston... Leslie... Stockbridge... Edgemont Park... Aurelius... Bunker Hill... Webberville... Dimondale... Dansville... Eden... Waverly... Fitchburg... Okemos... Bell Oak... Holt... Skyview Estates Airp... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EDT for south central Michigan.
